mapper.select: select c.id, c.userId, c.productId, c.productNum, p.name productName, p.description, p.price productPrice, f.picPath, c.createTime from easybuy_shopping_car c, easybuy_product p, easybuy_file f where c.isDelete = 0 and c.productId = p.id and p.picId = f.id and c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: update easybuy_shopping_car set isDelete = 1 where isDelete = 0 and id = #{id}
